title: Sleek Lucknow Escape with Rooftop Bar, Infinity Pool & Luxe Spa
description:
Embrace the charm of Lucknow's cultural tapestry from this chic Novotel sanctuary, ideally situated in the heart of Gomti Nagar, the perfect base for exploring the City of Nawabs. Step into spacious, contemporary rooms designed for comfort and unwind at the rooftop infinity-edge pool, or recharge at the spa and fitness centre.

Indulge in signature Awadhi cuisine, delicious kebabs and global favourites at The Square, or sip handcrafted cocktails with sweeping skyline views at The Edge rooftop bar. When it's time to explore, the city's historical gems, including the Bara Imambara and the iconic Rumi Darwaza, are all a short drive away.
offer_address: Viraj Khand-4, Viraj Khand, Gomti Nagar, Lucknow, Uttar Pradesh, 226010, India
